item.title: Meta 任命 ChatGPT 联合创始人为超级智能实验室首席科学家
item.description: Meta Platforms 首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）周五表示，Meta Platforms 已任命 ChatGPT 的联合创始人赵胜家（Shengjia Zhao）为其超级智能实验室（Superintelligence Lab）的首席科学家，公司正加速向高级人工智能领域推进。【原文：Meta Platforms has appointed Shengjia Zhao, co-creator of ChatGPT, as chief scientist of its Superintelligence Lab, CEO Mark Zuckerberg said on Friday, as the company accelerates its push into advanced AI.】

item.title: 特斯拉收到多份与 xAI 投资相关的股东提案
item.description: 特斯拉周五表示，已收到一些股东关于该公司投资首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司 xAI 的提案。【原文：Tesla said on Friday it has received a number of shareholder proposals regarding the automaker investing in CEO Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI.】

item.title: 美国上诉法院驳回美国证券交易委员会关于 "审计线索 "资金的规定
item.description: 法庭文件显示，一家联邦上诉法院周五驳回了美国证券交易委员会通过的关于资助全面市场监管系统的 2023 年法规，认为华尔街的最高监管机构没有提供足够的依据，允许证券交易所将其成本转嫁给会员。【原文：A federal appeals court on Friday struck down 2023 regulations adopted by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on funding a comprehensive market surveillance system, finding that Wall Street's top regulator had not provided a sufficient basis for allowing stock exchanges to pass on its costs to their members, court papers showed.】

item.title: 最后期限临近，投资者关注美欧可能达成的贸易协议
item.description: 投资者希望美国和欧盟之间可能达成的贸易协议能在下周五关税截止日期前为市场带来更多确定性。【原文：Investors are hopeful a potential trade deal between the U.S. and European Union could bring more certainty to markets ahead of next Friday's tariffs deadline.】

item.title: 派拉蒙全球公司称 Skydance 合并将在两周内完成
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）周五表示，在政府批准这项价值 84 亿美元的交易后，该公司预计将于 8 月 7 日前完成与 Skydance Media 的合并。【原文：Paramount Global said on Friday it expects to complete its merger with Skydance Media by August 7, following government approval for the $8.4 billion deal.】

item.title: 交易日：再创新高
item.description: - 交易日【原文：- TRADING DAY】

item.title: 特朗普和联邦通信委员会希望从哥伦比亚广播公司开始重塑媒体格局
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统和联邦通信委员会誓言要迫使美国广播媒体做出重大改变。【原文：President Donald Trump and the Federal Communications Commission have vowed to force American broadcast media outlets to make significant changes.】

item.title: 加州监管机构称，特斯拉计划扩大包车运输服务
item.description: 周五，加州监管机构表示，特斯拉已告知加州将扩大湾区包车运输服务的运营。【原文：Tesla has told California it would expand operations of a chartered transportation service in the Bay Area, a state regulator said on Friday.】

item.title: Centene 让华尔街对医疗补助保险公司提高利润持乐观态度
item.description: Centene 公司周五表示，该公司预计能够提高向各州收取的 2026 年低收入美国人医疗保险计划的费率，并提高利润率，华尔街因此对医疗补助保险公司重拾信心。【原文：Wall Street regained confidence in Medicaid insurers after Centene said on Friday it expects to be able to raise rates charged to states for 2026 health plans for low-income Americans and strengthen profit margins.】

item.title: 特朗普关税对巴西化学品出口商造成压力，引发订单取消
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁从 8 月 1 日起对南美国家的出口产品征收 50% 的新关税，去年向美国出口 24 亿美元的巴西化工产品公司面临着大量合同被取消的局面。【原文：Chemical products companies in Brazil, which exported $2.4 billion to the U.S. last year, face a slew of contract cancellations as President Donald Trump has threatened a new 50% tariff on the South American nation's exports from August 1.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，LVMH 集团正在洽谈出售 Marc Jacobs 事宜
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五援引知情人士的话报道，奢侈品集团 LVMH 正在讨论出售时尚品牌 Marc Jacobs，交易价格可能在 10 亿美元左右。【原文：Luxury goods group LVMH is in discussions to sell fashion label Marc Jacobs in a deal that could fetch around $1 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英特尔转至独立网络单元
item.description: 英特尔周五表示，公司计划将网络与通信业务独立出来，并已开始寻找投资者，新任首席执行官陈立武希望精简这家陷入困境的芯片制造商。【原文：Intel said on Friday it planned to establish its networking and communications business as a stand-alone company and has begun the process of identifying investors, as new CEO Lip-Bu Tan looks to streamline the struggling chipmaker.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，微软正在调查中国黑客是否通过警报了解到 SharePoint 的缺陷
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，微软正在调查其针对网络安全公司的早期预警系统是否发生泄密事件，导致中国黑客在其 SharePoint 服务中的漏洞得到修补之前就利用了这些漏洞。【原文：Microsoft is investigating whether a leak from its early alert system for cybersecurity companies allowed Chinese hackers to exploit flaws in its SharePoint service before they were patched, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: Spear AI 获得首轮融资，将人工智能应用于潜艇数据
item.description: 一家由美国海军退伍军人创办的初创公司，旨在帮助美国军方利用人工智能破译潜艇收集的数据，该公司已筹集到第一轮外部资金。【原文：A startup founded by U.S. Navy veterans aiming to help the U.S. military use artificial intelligence to decipher data gathered by submarines has raised its first round of outside capital.】

item.title: 独家报道墨西哥反垄断监管机构指控银行联合操纵价格
item.description: 墨西哥反垄断监督机构 COFECE 发现，根据路透社看到的一份政府机构文件，在该国运营的 21 家银行和金融机构可能对信用卡延期付款相关费用的定价负有责任。【原文：Mexico's antitrust watchdog COFECE has found that 21 banks and financial institutions operating in the country are likely responsible for fixing fees related to deferred credit card payments, according to a document produced by the government agency that was seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国结束对 Waymo 自动驾驶汽车碰撞和意外行为的调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周五表示，已结束对 Alphabet 旗下 Waymo 自动驾驶汽车发生的一系列轻微碰撞和意外行为进行的为期 14 个月的调查，但未采取进一步行动。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said Friday it has closed a 14-month investigation into a series of minor collisions and unexpected behavior from Alphabet's Waymo self-driving vehicles without taking further action.】

item.title: 特朗普：强势美元听起来不错，但弱势美元 "赚得更多
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，他喜欢强势美元，但弱势美元 "会让你赚得更多"。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday he liked a strong dollar but "you make a hell of a lot more money" with a weaker one.】

item.title: 消息人士称，花旗集团能源转型主管离职，转任 Moelis 职务
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周五表示，花旗集团清洁能源转型投资银行业务全球主管即将离开这家美国贷款公司，前往精品银行 Moelis 担任并购顾问。【原文：Citigroup's global head of clean energy transition investment banking is leaving the U.S. lender for a role advising on mergers and acquisitions at boutique bank Moelis , people familiar with the matter said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国关税最后期限临近，谈判陷入僵局，巴西陷入困境
item.description: 巴西官员和行业领袖表示，巴西正竭力避免美国在一周内征收50%的惩罚性关税，但高层会谈陷入僵局，美国公司也不愿就此问题与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对抗。【原文：Brazil is scrambling to avert punishing 50% U.S. tariffs in a week's time, but high level talks are stalled and U.S. companies are reluctant to confront U.S. President Donald Trump over the issue, officials and industry leaders say.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国可能无法与加拿大通过谈判达成贸易协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，美国可能不会与加拿大通过谈判达成贸易协议，并暗示其政府可能单方面设定关税税率。【原文：The United States may not reach a negotiated trade deal with Canada, U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday, suggesting his administration could set a tariff rate unilaterally.】

item.title: 特朗普称与欧盟达成贸易协议的几率为 50
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，美国与欧盟达成贸易协议的可能性为50%。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday said there was a 50-50 chance that the United States would reach a trade agreement with the European Union.】

item.title: 特朗普暗示美联储主席可能降息
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，他与美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）进行了良好的会晤，并得到了鲍威尔可能准备好降低利率的印象。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Friday he had a good meeting with Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell and got the impression Powell might be ready to lower interest rates.】

item.title: 消息人士称，西班牙电信正在就将墨西哥业务出售给 Beyond ONE 进行排他性谈判
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，西班牙电信巨头 Telefonica 正在就将其墨西哥业务出售给维珍移动墨西哥公司（Virgin Mobile Mexico）的所有者 Beyond ONE 进行独家谈判。【原文：Spanish telecom giant Telefonica is in exclusive talks to sell its Mexican business to Beyond ONE, the owner of Virgin Mobile Mexico, three sources with knowledge of the negotiations said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯电子商务公司 Ozon 称企业家 Chachava 持有其 28% 的股份
item.description: 俄罗斯电子商务公司 Ozon 周五表示，商人 Alexander Chachava 已从 Vostok Investments 收购了该公司 27.7% 的股份。【原文：Russian e-commerce company Ozon said on Friday that businessman Alexander Chachava had acquired a 27.7% stake in the company from Vostok Investments.】

item.title: 美国 6 月核心资本货物订单意外下降
item.description: 6 月份，美国主要制造业资本货物的新订单出人意料地下降，这表明，由于进口关税前的活动所带来的提振作用减弱，企业在设备方面的支出出现回落。【原文：New orders for key U.S.-manufactured capital goods unexpectedly fell in June, suggesting a pullback in business spending on equipment as the boost from front-loading of activity ahead of tariffs on imports faded.】

item.title: 彪马库存问题凸显零售商关税困境
item.description: 彪马在美国面临着两难境地：在匆忙从亚洲发货以躲避即将到来的关税之后，这家德国运动装品牌目前正在打折以清理库存，同时计划在今年提价以抵消不断上涨的成本。【原文：Puma faces a dilemma in the United States: after rushing shipments from Asia to beat incoming tariffs, the German sportswear brand is now discounting to clear stock, while planning to raise prices this year to offset rising costs.】

item.title: 据 Business Insider 报道，特斯拉计划本周末在旧金山推出 Robotaxis
item.description: 据 Business Insider 周五援引一份内部员工备忘录报道，特斯拉准备最快于本周末在旧金山推出机器人出租车服务。【原文：Tesla is preparing to launch its robotaxi service in San Francisco as soon as this weekend, Business Insider reported on Friday, citing an internal staff memo.】

item.title: 大众汽车首席执行官希望通过 "有吸引力 "的投资达成自己的关税协议
item.description: 欧洲最大的汽车制造商大众汽车公司首席执行官奥利弗-布卢姆（Oliver Blume）周五对投资者表示，一旦华盛顿和欧盟达成广泛的贸易协议，大众汽车希望投资承诺能够帮助其在美国关税问题上谈判取得进一步让步。【原文：Europe's largest car manufacturer Volkswagen is hoping investment commitments can help it negotiate further concessions on U.S. tariffs once Washington and the European Union strike a broad trade deal, CEO Oliver Blume told investors on Friday.】

item.title: 全球股票基金因对贸易协议持乐观态度每周吸引资金流入
item.description: 在截至7月23日的一周里，全球股票基金的资金流入再次回升，原因是对美国贸易协议的乐观情绪、强于预期的美国经济报告以及令人鼓舞的企业财报季开端提振了风险情绪。【原文：Inflows into global equity funds picked up again in the week through July 23 as optimism over U.S. trade deals, stronger than expected U.S. economic reports and an encouraging start to the corporate earnings season boosted risk sentiment.】

item.title: 随着竞争白热化，Charter 第二季度失去更多宽带用户
item.description: Charter Communications 周五公布的第二季度宽带用户亏损高于预期，因为这家有线电视巨头正在努力应对来自无线运营商的竞争，这些无线运营商将高速互联网服务与 5G 移动计划捆绑在一起。【原文：Charter Communications reported a higher-than-expected broadband subscribers loss in the second quarter on Friday, as the cable giant grappled with competition from wireless carriers that are bundling high-speed internet services with 5G mobile plans.】
